subtitle: Label your shulkers with style
description:
This addon requires the base pack to function. This pack makes it so that you can give a shulker box an item name and the shulker gets a visual label of the item on it!

How to name your shulkers:

This list shows all of the valid names for a shulker box. In these examples, I will be using the item "Apple".
  • Apple
  • Apple Shulker
  • Apple Box
  • Apple Shulker Box
  • Any Prefix You Want Apple
  • Any Prefix You Want Apple Shulker
  • Any Prefix You Want Apple Box
  • Any Prefix You Want Apple Shulker Box
All of these are case insensitive!
optifine: OptiFine is used to add the ability to change item models by renaming the item.
